categories: Category:Battles of the Great Galactic War

nodes.text: A campaign near the city of Gell Mattar took place in 3666 BBY during the Great Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Six months after the Battle of Alderaan, Republic forces under General Jace Malcom and the Jedi Knight Satele Shan routed the Imperials, though Shan chose to break off her romantic relationship with Malcom in fear of the man's inner darkness.
